meanings.sent1: The research paper provided citable evidence to support its claims.
meanings.sent2: The book contained many citable sources for further reading.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that the student's excuse was so citable it could be used in a comedy show.
meanings.sent4: Her actions were so citable that they became a model for others to follow.
meanings.sent5: The citable facts in the report made it easy to understand the topic.

meanings.sent1: The exceptional work was truly citable and deserved recognition.
meanings.sent2: His dedication to the project made him a citable example for his peers.
meanings.sent3: The delicious cake was so citable that it won first prize at the baking competition.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as citable as a shining star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The citable achievements of the team were celebrated by all.
